plot: Legendary hunter George Rushby vows to rid a Tanzanian village of a pride of lions that have killed 1,500 people - but the locals refuse to co-operate...
title: The Man-Eating Lions of Njombe
plot_es: Legendary hunter George Rushby vows to rid a Tanzanian village of a pride of lions that have killed 1,500 people - but the locals refuse to co-operate...
plot_en: Legendary hunter George Rushby vows to rid a Tanzanian village of a pride of lions that have killed 1,500 people - but the locals refuse to co-operate...
